text: muṉāḥpikkāṉa āṇkaḷum, muṉāḥpikkāṉa peṇkaḷum īmāṉ koṇṭavarkaḷai nōkki: "Eṅkaḷai kavaṉiyuṅkaḷ, uṅkaḷ oḷiyiliruntu nāṅkaḷum paṟṟa vaittuk koḷkiṟōm" eṉṟu kūṟum tiṉattai (niṉaivūṭṭuvīrāka); avarkaḷukkuk kūṟappaṭum, "uṅkaḷukkup piṉṉāl, tirumpic ceṉṟu piṉṉar oḷiyait tēṭik koḷḷuṅkaḷ." Piṟaku, avarkaḷukkiṭaiyē oru cuvar eḻuppappaṭum! Ataṟku oru vāyil irukkum, ataṉ uṭpuṟam (iṟai) rahmat irukkum, āṉāl ataṉ veḷippuṟattil - (ellāt) ticaiyilum vētaṉaiyirukkum
